## getMethods() function

Get the methods from an instance and its prototypes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getMethods<TValue extends Reflectable>(value: TValue): Set<Method<TValue>>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | TValue |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
